task.title: How to make a bloody mary
task.shortdesc: This task will explain what you need and what steps to take to make a bloody mary.

context.p: This is our family's secret recipe, so enjoy, but keep it safe!

You will need:
1 tablespoon celery salt
¼ lemon, cut into two wedges
½ tsp Worcestershire sauce
¼ tsp soy sauce
½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
dash cayenne pepper
¼ tsp hot sauce
½ tsp freshly grated horseradish
2 ounces vodka
4 ounces high-quality tomato juice
1 stick celery
3 pieces cooked
1 dill pickle spear
5 pitted green olives
5 pieces of beef jerky
5 1-in cubes of sharp cheddar cheese
2 long skewers
1 long skewer

step.cmd: Place the celery salt into a shallow plate or bowl.
Rub the rim of a 12-ounce glass or tumbler with one of the lemon wedges.
Coat the wet rim with the celery salt.
Place the lemon on the rim of the glass as a garnish and fill the glass with ice.
Add the Worcesterchire, soy, and hot sauces, black and cayenne pepper, and horseradish to the bottom of a cocktail shaker.
Fill the shaker with ice, and add the vodka, tomato juice, and juice from the second lemon wedge.
Shake the cocktail shaker vigorously, and taste for seasoning. At this point, you can adjust spices and sauces and add more according to your own preference.
Strain the contents of the shaker into the ice-filled glass.
Place the 5 olives on one of the skewers.
On the second skewer, alternate pices of beef jerky and cheese cubes.
Place the celery stick, the pieces of bacon, the pickle spear, the green olive skewer, and the beef and cheese skewer in the glass, and serve immediately.
